details: I designed and built complete mobile applications and websites for our clients.
Omega Renovation is a home/office renovations and remodelling company based in Ontario, Canada. I created and currently maintain the official company website.
I worked with a skilled team on projects using React, Nodejs and cloud computing with AWS. I also served as interim UI developer.

company: Google Developer Student Club - UTECH chapter
details: DSC is a community where students can build their technological skills, by exposing them to programming, data analytics, ML etc. I organized and led the club's activities, and also served as lead developer on projects like UTech Explore and 1nReady.

I co-founded and organized the FortesHacks 24-hour student hackathon competition at Campion College in 2020 with over 60 high school participants. I also mentored teams and conducted a workshop on cybersecurity.
